name: LOSKOP RADIO 211109_0324.wav
description: Playing around with loskop radio. Sometimes I play this audio channel on my stereo. It can be very surprising and inspiring.! Try it yourself. Loskop Radio Generative radio is a system that generates music by playing sounds hosted on freesound.org. It is an attempt to use the large and growing archives of audio content found on the web and the generative/algorithmicâ€¦ link: https://loskop.radio/generative-radio/ It is a part of the Freesound Labs!
